Hi All,

 I have came cross simple problem.
How to return String array in Junit. If u are
returning String is working. But i have no idea String
[].

 
Java Code:
public String[] getMandatoryParameters(){
	return new String[]{"SourceString"};
	}

JUnit code:  here testclass calling java class already
initialized in setup
public void testgetMandatoryParameters()
  {
   String getMandatoryParam = {"SourceString"};
   assertEquals( testClass.getMandatoryParameters ),
getMandatoryParam);
    }
 
I will appreciate ur help.
Cheers,
